name: Inazuma Eleven Strikers
description:
Inazuma Eleven Strikers is a RPG-sports game developed by Level 5. It was originally released in 2012. It was published by Level-5. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Inazuma Eleven Strikers on Wii.
Natsumi Kameoka and Yasunori Mitsuda scored the game.
